data.description: Data configuration block, including a list of datasets and global data configuration

datasets.description: List of datasets, where each dataset has its own configuration

processors.description: List of data processors, defining the data processing methods and their parameters to be used

name.description: Processor name, supporting StandardScalerProcessor, GrangerCausalityProcessor, etc.

params.description: Processor parameters, configured according to different processor types

window.description: Time window size, used to build sliding window features

test_size.description: Test set ratio, for example, 0.2 means an 8:2 split

ignore_columns.description: List of columns to be ignored

models.description: Model configuration block, used to define the model's enabled status, type, hyperparameters, and optional trainer settings (such as cross-validation and scoring metrics).

type.description: Model type, such as RandomForestClassifier, LogisticRegression, etc.

params.description: Model parameters, configured with corresponding hyperparameters based on different model types

trainer.description: Trainer parameters (optional), used to configure the model training process

scoring.description: Evaluation metric, such as accuracy, precision, etc.

trainers.description: Global trainer configuration, providing uniform training parameters for different models, such as the number of cross-validation folds and evaluation metrics

enabled.description: Whether to enable this trainer configuration

scoring.description: Evaluation metric, such as accuracy, precision, etc.

analysis_result_path.description: Analysis results output path, only specifying the folder path

data_result_path.description: Data processing results output path, only specifying the folder path
